rows: Subject: email titleBody: full message textFrom: sender's name and emailTo, CC, BCC: all recipient names and emailsThread ID: unique conversation ID
Subject: meeting titleBody: meeting description or agendaOrganizer: who created the meeting, name and emailParticipants: invited attendees, (both required and optional), names and emails
html:
Outlook object

Data available for AI Skill

Email

Subject: email title

Body: full message text

From: sender's name and email

To, CC, BCC: all recipient names and emails

Thread ID: unique conversation ID

Calendar meeting

Subject: meeting title

Body: meeting description or agenda

Organizer: who created the meeting, name and email

Participants: invited attendees, (both required and optional), names and emails
